name: Safety Removal
desc:
Completely removing safety protocols increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s/%s/%s/%s (depending on ship size, with a corresponding increase in acceleration) and allows the zero-flux engine boost to take effect regardless of flux level.

Drastically reduces weapon ranges past %s units by %s percent.

Increases maneuverability by %s percent.

Can not be installed on civilian ships. Incompatible with Safety Override.

name: Greater Drive Field Stabilizer
desc:
Stabilizes the fleet's drive bubble, increasing the maximum burn of the fleet by %s. The effect of multiple stabilizers is cumulative.

Increases the ship's sensor profile by %s.

name: Small Drone Hangar
desc: The fighter bays on this craft are very cramped by design, and can accommodate only small drones. This ship does not support any wings that are crewed or cost more than 12 ordinance points.

name: Point Defense Specialization
desc:
All weapon systems and turret mounts have been modified to only target small and fast targets, restricting this ship to only Point Defense and Anti-Fighter Weapons, all non-PD weapons have a large chance to malfunction.

Range of PD weapons is increased by %s and weapon turn rate increased by %s.

name: Tyrant Maw Bombardment
desc: Manifests orbital supremacy. Fires the Tyrant Maw and the modular weapons with Tyrant Eye active dealing massive damage to ground structures. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet. Reduces the fuel cost of a bombardment operation by %s units.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids. Greatly reduces fuel cost of bombardment.

name: Massive Hull
desc: This ship is extremely large, affording both a much larger array of sensors and a heavy sensor profile. Increases sensor strength by %s and sensor profile by %s. Due to the complexities of integrating so many systems, maintenance is increased by %s.

name: Shield Incompatible
desc: This ship or module is not compatible with shields, due to it's base design or because of the proximity of other modules.

name: Hangar Incompatible
desc: This ship or module is not compatible with improvised hangars, the hull cannot be cut to open a fighter bay without serious structural problems.

name: Frontal Locked Shields
desc: This ship or module's shield generators cannot spin and are locked at frontal projection, due to it's base design or because of the proximity of other modules.

name: Field Shield Generator
desc:
This ship uses an external generator to project a large shield with 1000 range radius, The shield allows allied ships to enter and is perfect for protecting a group of small ships. While enemy ships can also enter the Field, their projectiles will be absorbed by the shield instantly as they are shot.

The main Field Generator is located at the front module, if this module is destroyed the shields cannot operate. While the shields are active all hard flux will be transferred to the main ship, Soft flux will be managed by the shield module, if either overload the system shuts down.

Due to the unique technology used all common shield hullmods are incompatible with this ship. This ship can vent hard flux passively while the system is on.

name: Sinuous Structure
desc:
Different from most modular ships the Newfoundland has flexible connections between modules.

Each connected module changes the attributes of the main ship. If a segment of this ship is destroyed, the segments behind it will also be lost.

name: Multicore Ballistic Integration
desc:
The Shield module's targeting computers are fully integrated with the main ship's granting both the main ship and the modules %s extra range on Ballistic weapons. If this is a module, its parent's bonus will be used.

Not compatible with any other range increasing hullmods.

name: Rescue Drone
desc: This ship has an internal drone controller module, it is capable of creating and controlling a Rescue Drone, the drone will attempt to rescue friendly Frigates and Destroyers by swapping places with them.

name: Detonator Drone
desc: This ship has an internal drone controller module, it is capable of creating and controlling a Detonator Drone. The drone will teleport to stopped and disabled enemy ships before exploding for up to 2500 High Explosive damage.

name: Illusion Field
desc: The ship is able to run a signature scrambler for extended periods of time, camouflaging the ship as an asteroid reducing its effective sensor profile to zero.

name: Wurgandal Module
desc: Modules of the Wurgandal have their systems coordinated by the central core.

name: Weapons Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of weapons by %s.

name: Fleet Repair Optimizations
desc: Increases the rate at which the fleet repairs and recovers CR by %s. Does not stack (sometimes the UI wont display the bonus).
